description:
As of master 2016-12-12, there are four LOG.warning calls in nova.objects.resource_provider, all associated in some way with inventory capacity being violated in some fashion. Two of these log and then raise an exception, two are simply warnings.

For the two that log and then raise, instead of logging in the objects it would be more correct to raise where the exception is caught (the placement api layer).
title: in placement service capacity exceeded LOG.warning call is in wrong place

comments.content:
As of master 2016-12-12, there are four LOG.warning calls in nova.objects.resource_provider, all associated in some way with inventory capacity being violated in some fashion. Two of these log and then raise an exception, two are simply warnings.

For the two that log and then raise, instead of logging in the objects it would be more correct to raise where the exception is caught (the placement api layer).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cdent
